title: Request Showing Feedback
description: An agent has shown a property to several buyers. They need to request feedback from the buyers' agents to share with the seller.

tasks.description: Generate a list of all agents who have shown the property in the last week.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves a list of agent names and contact information from the showing service.

tasks.description: Send an automated feedback request form to each agent.
tasks.expected_outcome: A standardized feedback request email/form is sent to all agents on the list.

tasks.description: Compile the received feedback into a summary report for the seller.
tasks.expected_outcome: A report summarizing all feedback (e.g., comments on price, condition) is generated.
